alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 6:03AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Guadalupe, southwestern Gonzales, northeastern Wilson and east central Bexar Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 603 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Seguin, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, Schertz, Seguin, Cibolo, McQueeney, Nixon, St. Hedwig, La Vernia, Marion, Kingsbury, Santa Clara, New Berlin, Zuehl, Geronimo, Leesville, Nolte, Zipp, Oak Forest, Belmont, and Friendly Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
